texto: "Verified" is used to designate the corresponding status. [ISO 8402:1994] 22 © ISO/IEC 2001 – All rights reserved ISO/IEC 9126-1:2001(E) Annex C (informative) History of the work C.1 Background The software industry is entering a period of maturity, while at the same time software is becoming a crucial component of many of today's products. This pervasive aspect of software makes it a major new factor in trade. Furthermore, with new global demands for safety and quality, the need for international agreements on software quality assessment procedures is becoming important. There are essentially two approaches that can be followed to ensure product quality, one being assurance of the process
